email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to transport 25,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for reaching out. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 82,000, LOA 225m, for a freight quote of USD 25 per MT. The laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Given the current market conditions, I can reduce the rate to USD 23 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

USD 23 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of 20-25 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Emily
